meanings.definition: The act of causing permanent damage to the skin or tissue.
meanings.sent1: The scarring from the burn was visible on his arm.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that scarring would occur after the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy left scarring paw prints all over the freshly mopped floor.
meanings.sent4: The old house bore the scarring of time in its weathered walls.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes left a beautiful scarring on the canvas.

meanings.definition: A mark left on the skin or tissue as a result of injury or trauma.
meanings.sent1: She covered the scarring on her face with makeup.
meanings.sent2: The scarring on the tree trunk showed where the lightning had struck.
meanings.sent3: The scarring on the banana peel made it look like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The scarring on the old book told a story of its many readers.
meanings.sent5: The scarring on the cliff face revealed the passage of time.
